fields.Title of Presentation: <p><span>Brockett, Patrick L., Linda L. Golden, Shikhar Sarin, and James H. Gerberman (2024), “A Metric for Assessing and Addressing Vulnerability Risk in Markets with Rapidly Evaporating Competitive Advantage Positions,” ,  </span></p>
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Association of Marketing Theory and Practice Conference
fields.Description/Abstract: <span>The emergence of increased technology and global competition in certain rapidly evolving marketplaces has transformed strategic marketing.  These changes have made it harder for firms to obtain and retain a lasting competitive advantage useful for </span>increasing brand's awareness and overall sales. This changed market structure in some products due to rapid technological change and increasing competition and intensity of competition characterizes what is defined as hypercompetitive markets.  Using Data Envelopment Analysis this article contributes to an analysis of what Dagnino et al (2020) refer to as action based temporary competitive advantage analysis.
